noun.description: A dog of a dwarf breed like a bulldog with a broad flat nose and deeply wrinkled face.

verb.description: Prepare (clay) by working into a soft condition, typically in a machine with rotating blades.
Pack (a space, typically the space under a floor) with pug, sawdust, or other material in order to deaden sound.
examples: old-fashioned pugging with dry sand cannot be carried out

origin: Mid 19th century: from Hindi pag footprint.
